#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
 
struct use
{
    long int sum;
    int arr[10];
    int cardinality;
}obj[10000005];
 
int main()
{
	int n;
while(	cin>>n ) {
    long int i,save,j,k,ans,myans,arr[n];
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin >>arr[i];
    long int last=-1;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        save=arr[i];
        int arra[10]={0};
        while(save>0)
        {
            int a=save%10;
            arra[a]=1;
            save/=10;
        }
        save=last;
        for(j=0;j<=save;j++)
        {
            for(k=0;k<10;k++)
            {
                if(obj[j].arr[k]==1 && arra[k]==1)
                    break;
            }
            if(k==10)
            {
                last++;
                obj[last].sum=obj[j].sum+arr[i];
                for(k=0;k<10;k++)
                {
                if(obj[j].arr[k]==1 || arra[k]==1)
                        obj[last].arr[k]=1;
                else
                	obj[last].arr[k]=0;
               	}
                obj[last].cardinality=obj[j].cardinality+1;
            }
        }
        last++;
        obj[last].sum=arr[i];
        for(k=0;k<10;k++)
            obj[last].arr[k]=arra[k];
        obj[last].cardinality=1;
    }
    ans=-1;
    myans=-1;
    for(i=0;i<=last;i++)
    {
        if(obj[i].sum==ans)
        {
            if(obj[i].cardinality>myans)
                myans=obj[i].cardinality;
        }
        else if(obj[i].sum>ans)
        {
            ans=obj[i].sum;
            myans=obj[i].cardinality;
        }
    }
    cout << myans << endl;
}
    return 0;
}
